channel.description: Recent content in textmining on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Generating Word Cloud from court case data with python3
item.description: -Download case data (PDF) -http://www.courts.go.jp/app/hanrei_jp/search1 Convert PDF to text using Automator -http://qiita.com/yuki_bg/items/2e6efe93992d83752312 After that, install MeCab, wordcloud, etc. -Install anaconda -clone strong one (neologd) of mecab dictionary brew install mecab mecab-ipadic pip3.5 install mecab-python3 pip3.5 install wordcloud pip3.5 install numpy Pillow matplotlib # library required to use wordcloud #brew install numpy # error #brew install homebrew/python/numpy # smthngs wrong... #sudo xcode-select --install # doesnt work... ### Get MeCab dictionary "mecab-ipadic-neologd" with new language cd /usr/local/lib/mecab/dic git clone --depth 1 https://github.
